title: AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, 4000A Peak 27800mAh Battery Jump Starter (for All Gas or Up to 10L Diesel), Battery Booster Power Pack, 12V Auto Jump Box with LED Light, USB Quick Charge 3.0, 4000A peak current, includes 88Wh portable battery charger
descriptions:
Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate solution for all your vehicle emergency power needs! With a whopping 4000A peak current and a massive 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is suitable for all gas engines and diesel engines up to 10L. Whether you're jump-starting a car, motorcycle, ATV, UTV, lawn mower, or snowmobile, this powerhouse can handle it all!

Equipped with a 12V Auto Jump Box, LED light with multiple modes (flashlight, SOS, strobe), and USB Quick Charge 3.0 technology, this jump starter is not only powerful but also versatile. The intelligent protection systems ensure safety with features like short circuit protection, low battery protection, high-temperature protection, and reverse connection protection.

With 40 start times on a full charge and charging ports including USB and Type C, this jump starter is a reliable companion on the road. Plus, it comes with essential accessories like jumper cables, USB-C cable, cigarette lighter converter, and a carry case for convenience.

Don't let a dead battery ruin your day - trust the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter to get you back on the road in no time. And with 24-hour online after-sales support, we've got your back every step of the way. Don't wait, get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and experience the peace of mind of having a reliable power source wherever you go!

Introducing the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter, the ultimate power pack for your vehicle! With a massive 4000A peak current and 27800mAh battery capacity, this jump starter is a must-have for all gas or up to 10L diesel engines. The 12V Auto Jump Box comes equipped with an LED light for emergencies, USB Quick Charge 3.0 for fast charging, and intelligent protection systems for safety.

Not only is this jump starter powerful, but it's also portable and ruggedly designed to withstand any situation. The included metal clamps ensure a secure connection every time. Plus, with charging speeds 75% faster than ordinary power banks, you'll never be left stranded.

Suitable for a variety of vehicles including cars, motorcycles, ATV, UTV, lawn mowers, and snowmobiles, the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter can start your engine up to 40 times on a full charge. The package includes everything you need to get started, from jumper cables to a carry case.

Don't wait for a dead battery to ruin your day. Get the AVAPOW Car Jump Starter now and enjoy the peace of mind that comes with having a reliable backup power source. And with our 24-hour online after-sales team, you can rest assured that we've got you covered. Order yours today!

Don't get stranded on the road without power - get your AVAPOW Car Jump Starter today and enjoy the peace of mind of having a reliable power source wherever you go.
